name: Facebook Story
primary_goal_vibe: Daily presence, quick touchpoints, behind-the-scenes access, and low-friction interaction.
tone_preference: Casual, direct, and community-oriented. Feels immediate and informal.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: Use only essential on-screen text. Each story should drive one simple action. Avoid dense explanations or multiple ideas per screen.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: If text is used, keep it to a single short sentence per slide.

on_screen_text_guidelines.primary_role: Instantly clarify the action or context.

stickers_interaction.sticker_strategy: Whenever possible, include one interactive sticker to boost engagement.
stickers_interaction.link_usage: Use links only when there is clear, immediate user value.

hashtags_mentions.recommended_hashtags: Not recommended as a primary tactic.
hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Stories do not depend on hashtags for discovery.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag people or pages when it increases relevance or encourages resharing.

technical_constraints.safe_area_note: Avoid placing text or stickers near the very top or bottom of the frame.

disallowed_practices: Using Stories only for static announcements without interaction
